name: argmate
author: Mathias Wulff
description: Fast CLI parameter parsing. Zero dependencies. Good DX. Pre-compile for turbo speed.

scripts.build: bun run build-esm && bun run build-cjs && bun run build-types
scripts.build-esm: bun build --target node --format esm src/argMate.ts src/argMateMini.ts src/argEngine.ts src/argEngineMini.ts --outdir dist/ --minify --sourcemap=none
scripts.build-cjs: bun build --target node --format cjs src/argMate.ts src/argMateMini.ts src/argEngine.ts src/argEngineMini.ts --outdir dist/cjs/ --minify
scripts.build-types: bunx tsc -p tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir dist/types && rexreplace '^#!.*' '' dist/types/*.d.ts && cat dist/types/*.d.ts > dist/types.d.ts && rm -fr dist/types
scripts.test: bun tst && bun run build-esm && bun run test-bundle
scripts.test-ci: bun run test-format && bun lint && bun run test && bun run test-cov
scripts.test-perf: bun run test-perf-cli && bun run test-perf-js
scripts.test-perf-cli: bun run test && cd bench/perf-v3 && sh test-cli3.sh
scripts.test-perf-js: bun run test && cd bench/perf-v3 && sh test-js.sh
scripts.prerelease: bun install && bun format && bun run test
scripts.postrelease: npm publish && git push && git push --tags && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version"
